entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -15.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 02:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -15.2°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -16.9°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
